name: perftop

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), cuni(c0)), cuni(c0)))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈ Perf, c0 ∈ Top, ((limPt ` c0)` ⋃ c0)= ⋃ c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cperf), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), cuni(c0)), cuni(c0))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Perf → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Perf ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧((limPt ` c0)` ⋃ c0)= ⋃ c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cperf), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), cuni(c0)), cuni(c0))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Perf → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Perf ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧((limPt ` c0)` ⋃ c0)= ⋃ c0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cperf), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), cuni(c0)), cuni(c0))))
-| wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c0))

comment: A perfect space is a topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Dec-2016.)
